topComments.author: Mini Rag
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s amamos isto. Todos os animais est√£o sendo reabilitados, o que √© √≥timo. Ao contr√°rio de outros zool√≥gicos, este cen√°rio √© realmente uma selva. At√© os insetos (use repelente de insetos). Existem animais incr√≠veis ao redor. Claro que voc√™ vai adorar o leopardo, o tucano e as cobras. Mas voc√™ ficar√° surpreso e encantado com os outros p√°ssaros, como a harpia, e as jaguatiricas (ou√ßa-os grunhir!), Corujas (elas v√£o piar) e os pelicanos (batendo as asas como loucos na √°gua ) Reserve um tempo para ler os sinais, eles s√£o engra√ßados e informativos.  (Original) We LOVED it. All the animals are being rehabilitated, which is so great. Unlike other zoos, this setting truly is jungle. Down to the bugs (wear bug spray). There are amazing animals all around. Of course you'll love the leopard, toucan, and the snakes. But you'll be surprised and delighted be the other birds, like the Harpy Eagle, and the ocelots (listen to them grunt!), Owls (they'll hoot), and the pelicans (flapping to their wings like crazy in the water). Do take the time to read the signs, they are both funny and informative.

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Absolutamente surpreendente! A equipe √© muito acolhedora e amig√°vel. Eles compartilharam muitas informa√ß√µes sobre animais resgatados e fatos. Ele rola por gostosuras üòÜ  (Original) Absolutely AMAZING! The staff is very welcoming and friendly. They shared lots of info about rescued animals and facts. So refreshing to see animals with plenty room to roam around and play. You can tell they are happy and look super healthy. Worth the visit! We fell in love with Martin the jaguar. He rolls for treats üòÜ

topComments.author: Stijn Floren
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta foi uma √≥tima experi√™ncia e definitivamente vale a pena uma viagem de um dia se voc√™ estiver nas proximidades. O 'zoo' (mais um parque de resgate da vida selvagem) est√° localizado em um belo cen√°rio com vegeta√ß√£o exuberante da selva. H√° uma grande variedade de vida selvagem nativa de Belize (jaguar, macacos bugios, macaco-aranha, crocodilos, harpia, jaguatirica e muito mais). A vida selvagem era muito vis√≠vel e ansiosa para 'mostrar' 'sua beleza. A cafetaria oferece refei√ß√µes a pre√ßos muito acess√≠veis. Compre algo na loja de souvenirs para apoiar esta grande causa üëç  (Original) This was a great experience and definitely worth a day trip if you're in the vicinity. The 'zoo' (more of a wildlife rescue park) is located in a beautiful setting with lush jungle vegetation. There's a broad variety of Belize native wildlife (jaguar, howler monkeys, spider monkey, crocodiles, Harpy eagle, ocelot and much much more). The wildlife was very visible and eager to 'show off' 'it's beauty. The cafeteria offers meals at very affordable prices. Buy something from the souvenir shop to support this great cause üëç

topComments.author: Courtney Bailey

Ele foi muito informativo e novo muito sobre o zool√≥gico e a √°rea circundante. Ele sabia de quais animais pod√≠amos acariciar e de quais ficar longe. Recomendo!  (Original) This place was neat. We stopped while on a carnival cruise and hired King David Belize Tours / AlTourNative Belize Services for a personal tour to the zoo. He was very informative and new a lot about the zoo and surrounding area. He knew what animals we could pet and which ones to stay away from. Would highly recommend!

topComments.author: Thomas Reeber

Al√©m dos animais, adoramos os zool√≥gicos realistas e a sinaliza√ß√£o espirituosa que fez voc√™ rir üòÉ! Voc√™ consegue encontrar o "gatinho" nas fotos com folhagem verde??  (Original) Quite nice. topComments.author: Aiden Rodriguez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amei esse pequeno zool√≥gico! Passei algumas horas aqui explorando e vendo os animais incr√≠veis. Eu parei no meu caminho para a cidade de Belize de San Ignacio. Acabei de dizer ao motorista do √¥nibus para me deixar l√°.  (Original) I loved this little zoo! I spent a few hours here exploring and seeing the amazing animals. I stopped in on my way to Belize city from San Ignacio. I just told the bus driver to drop me off there.

topComments.author: Suzanne Verbrugge
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Paramos no Zoo a caminho de Belmopan. Eu vi animais que nunca tinha visto antes apenas na tv. Os cuidadores do Zool√≥gico explicaram que a maioria dos animais foram resgatados e muitos deles eram animais dom√©sticos. Eles fazem muito para coloc√°-los de volta na natureza e os chip para seguir e ver como eles est√£o indo. N√≥s apreciamos a explica√ß√£o dos animais, pois todos eles tinham uma hist√≥ria.  (Original) We stopped at the Zoo on our way to Belmopan. I saw animals I have never seen before only on tv. The caretakers in the Zoo explained that most of the animals were rescued and a lot of them were domestic animals. They do a lot to put them back in nature and chip them to follow and see how they are doing. We enjoyed the explanation of the animals as they all had a story.

topComments.author: Steven D Budd
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Zool√≥gico realmente incr√≠vel! Sombra agrad√°vel durante toda a experi√™ncia, sinais muito brincalh√µes e animais incr√≠veis. No geral, uma experi√™ncia incr√≠vel, basta usar repelente de insetos  (Original) Really amazing zoo! Nice shade throughout the experience, very playful signs, and amazing animals. Overall an amazing experience, just wear bug spray

topComments.author: Jessica Hill
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um dos melhores zool√≥gicos que j√° estive. N√£o √© enorme, mas tem uma √≥tima vis√£o de perto dos animais e tamb√©m √© √©tico, pois os √∫nicos animais l√° s√£o resgates que est√£o sendo reabilitados ou que n√£o sobreviveram na natureza por algum motivo. Eu amo a miss√£o do zool√≥gico.  (Original) This is one of the best zoo's I've ever been to. It's not huge, but it has great up close views of the animals and also is ethical since the only animals there are rescues that are being rehabilitated or couldn't survive in the wild for any given reason. I love the zoo's mission.

topComments.author: Magali

Le personnel est tr√®s sympathique et j'ai enfin pu voir tous les animaux que compte le Belize... surtout le magnifique tapir !

topComments.author: Angel Roque
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© absolutamente lindo e tem um bom pre√ßo. O seguran√ßa no dia em que fomos era o ser humano mais rude de todos os tempos. Em primeiro lugar, ele n√£o estava em sua esta√ß√£o quando chegamos e, quando finalmente decidiu aparecer, foi incrivelmente rude conosco s√≥ porque lhe fizemos uma pergunta com educa√ß√£o. Gra√ßas a Deus que o zool√≥gico foi uma experi√™ncia muito boa porque √© um lugar lindo.  (Original) This place is absolutely beautiful and it's nicely priced. The security guard the day we went was the rudest human being ever. First of all he was not at his station when we arrived and when he finally decided to show up he was incredibly rude to us just because we asked him a question nicely. Thank God that the zoo was a really good experience because it is a beautiful place.

topComments.author: David Lyon
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Zool√≥gico muito legal, muitos animais interessantes dos quais voc√™ pode se aproximar, boa sombra, placas divertidas e tudo muito educativo. Se voc√™ estiver visitando Belize, definitivamente d√™ uma chance.  (Original) Really cool zoo, lots of interesting animals that you can get close to, good shade, fun signs, and all very educational. If you're visiting Belize, definitely give it a go.

topComments.author: Phatty Arbuckle
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtima maneira de ver a vida selvagem local em um habitat natural bem cuidado. Os anu√°rios parecem contentes e relaxados. Todos os gatos eram t√£o lindos.  (Original) Great way to see the local wildlife in a well taken care of natural-like habitat. The annuals seem content and relaxed. All of the cats were so gorgeous.

topComments.author: Dawn McFarley
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Experi√™ncia maravilhosa, tivemos um tempo maravilhoso vendo todos os animais ex√≥ticos. Almocei l√°, barato e a comida deliciosa. Definitivamente vai voltar.  (Original) Wonderful experience, we had a wonderful time seeing all the exotic animals.  Ate lunch there, inexpensive and the food was delicious.  Definitely will return.

topComments.author: Kristine Goodyear
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um local obrigat√≥rio para os amantes da vida selvagem e da natureza que visitam Belize. Passamos a noite em uma cabana r√∫stica na √°gua no The Tropical Education Center (Belize Zoo Lodge) e fizemos um tour noturno privado para ver os animais noturnos do zool√≥gico.  N√≥s amamos cada minuto desta experi√™ncia √∫nica - tempestade pac√≠fica e sons da natureza vindos do p√¢ntano, deliciosas refei√ß√µes caseiras, encontros e alimenta√ß√£o pessoais com animais selvagens e educa√ß√£o e vis√£o de uma equipe experiente e atenciosa que √© apaixonada sobre o trabalho que fazem.  Tudo foi incr√≠vel, gra√ßas ao Melvin (ele √© o MELHOR!), Juan Carlos e Edward. Todos os membros da equipe foram simp√°ticos, atenciosos e profissionais e cuidaram muito bem de n√≥s.  Foi a maneira absolutamente perfeita de passar nossa √∫ltima noite antes de voar de volta para a realidade no dia seguinte. Com certeza voltaremos ao Zool√≥gico de Belize novamente e encorajaremos outros a visitar e apoiar o trabalho cr√≠tico que est√£o fazendo em nome da vida selvagem.  (Original) This is a must-do for wildlife and nature lovers visiting Belize. We spent the night in a rustic cabin on the water at The Tropical Education Center (Belize Zoo Lodge) and went on a private night tour to see the zoo's nocturnal animals.  We loved every single minute of this unique experience - peaceful rainstorm and nature sounds coming from the swamp, delicious home-cooked meals, up-close-and-personal wildlife encounters and feedings, and education and insight from knowledgeable and caring staff who are passionate about the work they do.  Everything was incredible, thanks to Melvin (he's the BEST!), Juan Carlos and Edward. All the staff members were friendly, accommodating and professional and took such great care of us.  It was the absolutely perfect way to spend our last night before flying back home to reality the next day. We will definitely go back to the Belize Zoo again and encourage others to visit and support the critical work they're doing on behalf of wildlife.

topComments.author: Mike Smith
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um zool√≥gico muito bom. √â mais um santu√°rio de animais do que um zool√≥gico, pois todos os animais aqui s√£o resgatados ou n√£o podem ser soltos e est√£o aqui para educar os visitantes. Todos t√™m suas pr√≥prias hist√≥rias. Todos os recintos parecem espa√ßosos e adequadamente plantados. Observamos alguns comportamentos naturais de alguns dos animais, o que foi tranquilizador. N√≥s somos do Reino Unido, ent√£o praticamente todos os animais aqui s√£o novos para n√≥s. Foi fascinante ver todas aquelas novas esp√©cies. N√£o tivemos problemas em localizar as on√ßas e macacos bugios, pois todos estavam relaxando perto dos per√≠metros de seus recintos e cuidando de seus neg√≥cios. Os funcion√°rios s√£o simp√°ticos e experientes e felizes em responder a perguntas. Tamb√©m conseguimos pagar uma doa√ß√£o e alimentar uma das antas (animal nacional de Belize) que foi um destaque. Tudo em todo este parque vale bem a pena a visita. N√£o √© grande, mas certamente caminh√°vel em algumas horas ao redor dos caminhos sinuosos. Os √¥nibus da cidade de Belize s√£o bastante regulares em ambas as dire√ß√µes, por isso √© barato e f√°cil de chegar.  (Original) This is a really good zoo. It's more an animal sanctuary than a zoo, as all the animals here are either rescued or cannot be released and are here to educate visitors. The all have their own stories. The enclosures all seem spacious and appropriately planted. We observed some natural behaviours from some of the animals which was reassuring. We're from the UK so pretty much every animal here is brand new to us. It was fascinating to see all those new species. We had no problems spotting the jaguars and howler monkeys as they were all relaxing close to the perimeters of their enclosures and going about their business. Staff are friendly and knowledgeable and happy to answer questions. We were also able to pay a donation and feed one of the tapirs (a Belize national animal) which was a highlight. All in all this park is well worth the visit. It's not large but certainly walkable in a couple of hours around the winding pathways. Buses from Belize city are quite regular in both directions so it's cheap and easy to get to.

topComments.author: Andrew Muha
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Melhor zool√≥gico de todos os tempos, a intera√ß√£o com os Jaguares tamb√©m valeu o pre√ßo. Todos deveriam experimentar, se poss√≠vel. Os animais s√£o mais felizes do que j√° vi em qualquer outro zool√≥gico, devido ao ambiente natural e ao qual s√£o mantidos  (Original) Best zoo ever, the interaction with the Jaguars as well worth the price. Everyone should experience if possible. The staff is amazing. The animals are happier than I've seen any other zoo, Due to the natural environment and which they are kept

topComments.author: Eike Hoffmann
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lindo lugar para passar a noite! A propriedade possui trilhas naturais e acomoda√ß√µes encantadoras. E se sua agenda permitir, com certeza fa√ßa o NIGHT TOUR no zool√≥gico! Voc√™ tem encontros de perto √∫nicos com on√ßas, jaguatiricas, etc. S√≥ lamento que n√£o tivemos outro dia para passar aqui!  (Original) Beautiful place to spend the night! The property has nature trails and lovely accommodations. And if your schedule allows, absolutely do the NIGHT TOUR at the zoo! You get unique up-close encounters with jaguars, ocelots, etc. Only regret is that we didn‚Äôt have another day to spend here!
